name: Random lines
description: The art is inspired by Vera Molnar. In this example, I played with randomness, and every time you reload the page, the lines appear in a different place on the canvas and create a different shape.

name: Random lines inspired by Vera Molnar
description: Every rectangle has a different art of lines, changing every time you load the page.

name: Random lines in movement
description: Allowing lines to loop and make them look like an old TV screen.

name: Flowers inspired by Tyler Hobbs
description: I recreated the idea of Tyler Hoobs that shows a grid of flowers that are different in every cell. These flowers confirm that nothing is the same and everybody can be slightly different.

name: Flower wallpaper inspired by Tyler Hobbs
description: Making a wallpaper from different colors and shapes of flowers. The shape of the petal is more related to the original Tyler Hobbs daisy art.

name: Rectangle art inspired by Georg Nees
description: Recreation of the rectangle art going to one side, creating an illusion of flying away.

name: Rectangle art inspired by Georg Nees with a color grid
description: The art is more similar to the original Georg Nees' art piece, but with a color grid with a thought of disappearing rectangles.

name: Rectangle art
description: Playing with a color grid and randomness, giving a little 3D effect

name: Flow field
description: Played with values and created this more geometrical type of flow field from a class example

name: Smoother Flow field
description: Created a smoother flow field with different colors based on line position at the moment

name: Flow field in rectangle
description: More smother flow field in a smaller rectangle, creating a look of aurora

name: Wave
description: Sinus waves made in a circle that changes its shape and size

name: Multiple waves
description: Adding additional waves to make different shapes

name: Sound
description: The tone.js gives a random note and creates a wave.
